description: Youzen is A disciple at Konronsan. Actually, he is the son of the leader of Kingoutou, Tsuutenkyoushu and a youkai senin. He is a person of extreme confidence and takes great pride in his appearance. He has the ability to change into the body of any living thing, although his favorite transformation is that of Dakki. He is called the genius discipline.
name: Youzen
